name: Who Wants to Beat Up a Millionaire
name_original: Who Wants to Beat Up a Millionaire
description:
Who Wants to Beat Up a Millionaire is an arcade game developed by Hypnotix. It came out on 01-01-2000. Simon & Schuster Interactive published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Who Wants to Beat Up a Millionaire on PC.
